briefTitle: Clinical Trial of CoQ10 for Mild-to-Moderate Statin-Associated Muscle Symptoms
officialTitle: Clinical Trial of CoQ10 for Mild-to-Moderate Statin-Associated Muscle Symptoms
conditions: HMG COA Reductase Inhibitor Adverse Reaction
summary: This study will evaluate whether a dietary supplement, coenzyme Q10 (CoQ10), will improve muscle symptoms, such as muscle aches, pains, cramps, and/or weakness, which are experienced by some individuals who use statin medications.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Reduction in Muscle Pain Associated With Statin Use
